price: (21) He punishes whom He wills and has mercy upon whom He wills, and to Him you will be returned.
arabic: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُقۡلَبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yuʿadhibu man yashāu wayarḥamu man yashāu wa-ilayhi tuq'labūna
